subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The WAC announced Thursday that it was adding Texas-San Antonio and Texas State to a football lineup that will lose the B.C.S.-busting Broncos next year and the key members Fresno State and Nevada in 2012.
snippet: The WAC announced Thursday that it was adding Texas-San Antonio and Texas State to a football lineup that will lose the B.C.S.-busting Broncos next year and the key members Fresno State and Nevada in 2012.
